Articles.Content: Hey guys, just wanted to ask how i do post Pictures / get imgur.If you know how, please send me a private message. Thanks

It's better to discuss these things in the threads, that way if someone else needs the same info they can get their answers here instead of wondering if you ever got the answer.

To post an image, you need to know the url to it. Usually it's something like [defunct site link removed by moderator] and it's what you see in your browser bar when you've got just the image. It should almost always end in jpg, png, or gif and it will never end in html. If it ends in php it's probably wrong too.

To put it in the post, you enter code like this (without the space between the [ and the img):

[defunct site link removed by moderator]

which will make it show up as so:

[defunct site link removed by moderator]

To post an imgur album, you need to know the code for the album. If the url to your album is http://imgur.com/a/Di0gT then your code is Di0gT and you put that in the post like so (again with no space, this time between [ and imgur):

[ imgur]Di0gT[/imgur]

which will make it look like this:

Javascript is disabled. View full album
